author: jdillon
msg: Add flag to skip assembly installation for geronimo:start, this prevents extra work when geronimo:install has already been invoked

author: joerg
msg: It seems the comment about missing consideration of XML declaration does no longer apply.

For http://marc.info/?t=117615325600006&r=1&w=4 I played around with reactivated wsproxy sample and modified response body byte[] on the fly. The observed error only happened when the actual encoding was ISO-8859-1 and the XML declaration was missing, ie. the XML parsed by default as UTF-8.

author: joerg
